attributes.title: ✨So bad I cried ✨
attributes.review: I was not aware of the fact that this app was a horror game 😭 When I opened the app the first thing I saw was a scary ✨orange ✨ man staring at me. I immediately jumped and screamed because it was the scariest thing i had ever seen in my life 👹 If you don’t like horror games DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP! 😿

attributes.title: This app is so dumb
attributes.review: It made my phone mess up. As soon i started this app it crashed. Plus i saw a orange face in it got scared. If Mexicans are lazy plz think about what ur saying because it looks like u haven’t been on a treadmill  for years please sit down sir.

attributes.title: #tiktok2020
attributes.review: This is the worst app on planet earth. It’s full of hatred and racism and is really disturbing the content the app store and apple allow on their site. Ill be taking my money elsewhere if they continue to support and allow this hatred on their platform

attributes.title: 😣TikTok😔
attributes.review: Worst app ever. There are so many people that have worked so hard to get where they are on TikTok now, they could have 2 million followers, 9million or even 60+ million followers. Just overall this is the worst app 🥰🥰

attributes.title: Just no
attributes.review: This app is so horrible I gave my grandma STDs and it glitches so much even my dead grandma is faster then this dumb app you should never get this app I got because I looks stupid dumb and 🤢 but it turns out this app kills people

attributes.title: Terrible.
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and my phone started to glitch and I actually got a VIRUS on my phone because of this. I’m highly disappointed in this app and someone needs to update the polices and terms on this or I shall sue.💅🏾❤️

attributes.title: This app is trash
attributes.review: I downloaded it to make sure that i’m on my a game about the campaign but it keeps making my phone crash and it’s just so bad i’ll just stay updated on the news. 😪😪😪

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible
attributes.review: This app is always glitchy and doesn’t work at all. And why would you even get rid of TikTok. If you want America to be great quit taking away things that makes America happy.

Look 👀 for 4️⃣ the 💁‍♀️gummy 😽 bear 🐻 album ✒️in 🎈 stores 🏬 on 🚘 November 🏗 13th 🥨 with 🍠 lots 🌪 of 🐉 music 🎶 videos 📢and➕extras💰

I downloaded this app for the meme and then the next day all my contacts were glitching and disappeared. Would not recommend.
